name: Strain of the Gods
description:
Many years ago, a race of ancient deities arose from a deep slumber. In their hunger for wealth and power they caused the demise of mankind. At the brink of a complete extinction, only a small village escaped the eyes of the gods, until now. Baring the legacy of mankind, it is up to you to aid the small mountain town of Javalon to please the celestial beings while slowly increasing its population. How long will you last before you too perish?

Controls :

Key ActionLeft ClickSelect a single unit, confirm position to move to  
Confirm an actionRight Click & Drag Select multiple unitsTabToggle minimapArrow KeysMove cameraLeft CTRL + UP/DOWN Follow a villager

Theme: Sacrifices must be made

I decided to go for a minimalistic resource managing game with RTS elements.  No fancy colors, no epic backgrounds, just another old school game. Programmed from scratch including custom A* pathfinding , event system and MOST importantly : my first attempt at procedural music :D.
